content: row 2 single_crochet in last chain space of previous row *ch1 single_crochet in next chain space* repeat * to * 11 more times ending with the last single_crochet in the turning chain space of the previous row chain 2 turn work repeat row 2 x 3 more times for a total of 5 row at the end of the last row omit the chain 2 and don t turn work over this is the second side of the second ring of colour rotate work 90 degrees so we are working along the third side of the centre square side 3 makes side 3 the same way as side 2 side 4 row 1 ch2 *single_crochet ch1* 16 times making the single_crochet evenly along the whole side of the square and ending with a single_crochet and leaving off the last chain chain 2 turn work row 2 single_crochet in last chain space of previous row *ch1 single_crochet in next chain space* repeat * to * 14 more times ending with the last single_crochet in the turning chain space of the previous row chain 2 turn work repeat row 2 x 3 more times for a total of 5 row at the end of the last row omit the chain 2 and don t turn work over this completes the third ring of colour in your square weave in yarn tails and your square is finished make as many squares as you desire for more information on how to crochet this square please refer at the video tutorial on my youtube channel little woollie makes which can be found at this address https //youtu be/dxrahj5psmw
